attributes.action: provide more support for home schooled children and teenagers and to provide a way for home schooled teenagers to partipate in the Arts GCSE's without having to go into school.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to provide more support for home schooled children and teenagers and to provide a way for home schooled teenagers to participate in the Arts GCSE's without having to go into school. I am home schooled and it is extremely difficult to do when there is no support (financial or otherwise) from the government, I have decided to pursue a career in performing arts however I cannot do any of the Arts GCSE's unless I go into college with other much older students and I don’t wish to do this! It would be good to have some support as it was the horrendous bullying in a state school that was the reason I left.
